long_description: The Fisherman PFD by Stohlquist has all the features kayak anglers have been waiting for! Durable Cordura(R) nylon shell resists abrasion and UV rays for long-lasting service. Stretchy, adjustable neoprene shoulders follow your movement without getting in the way. Unique cross-chest cinch strap totally eliminates annoying ride-up and keeps flotation in place, to keep you floating high in the water. Eco-conscious Gaia(TM) PVC-free foam is soft and flexible and won't break down in a wet environment. Mesh side panels with wide side cinch-straps secure the fit and promote airflow. Dual drop-down pouch pockets feature tool hangers and mesh inside pockets and provide space for small tackle boxes. Pouch pockets are reinforced with an outer EVA shell to protect items inside and, when unzipped, provide a shelf to hold tackle as you tie knots. Internal pockets secure small valuables, tools, leader spools and hooks. Multiple tool hangers provide ample room for securing forceps, pliers and nippers to your vest. Special loops let you quickly secure your rod when you need to retrieve an anchor or release a fish.
short_description: The Fisherman PFD by Stohlquist has all the features kayak anglers have been waiting for!
